dataset_description:
This dataset contains the data used to create the Open Edition of the CWTS Leiden Ranking 2023. The dataset includes (1) data about the universities included in the Leiden Ranking Open Edition 2023 and the links between these universities and their affiliated organizations, (2) data about the publications included in the Leiden Ranking Open Edition 2023 and the links between these publications and universities and main fields, (3) indicators at the level of publications, and (4) indicators at the level of universities and main fields.

The Leiden Ranking Open Edition 2023 is based on the OpenAlex snapshot released on November 21, 2023. The snapshot data is not included in this dataset.

The source code for creating this dataset is available in the following GitHub repository: https://github.com/CWTSLeiden/CWTS-Leiden-Ranking-Open-Edition

See the following blog post for more information about the Leiden Ranking Open Edition 2023: https://doi.org/10.59350/89wpz-hpz32

See the following blog post for more information about the Leiden Ranking Open Edition 2025: https://doi.org/10.59350/jvjy2-4ww95

This dataset contains the data used to create the CWTS Leiden Ranking Open Edition 2025. The dataset includes (1) data about the universities included in the Leiden Ranking Open Edition 2025 and the links between these universities and their affiliated organizations, (2) data about the publications included in the Leiden Ranking Open Edition 2025 and the links between these publications and universities and main fields, (3) indicators at the level of publications, and (4) indicators at the level of universities and main fields.

The Leiden Ranking Open Edition 2025 is based on the OpenAlex snapshot from August, 2025. The snapshot data is not included in this dataset.

schema.name: citing_work_id
schema.description: OpenAlex work identifier of the citing work. See [work] table.

schema.name: cited_work_id
schema.description: OpenAlex work identifier of the cited work. See [work] table.

schema.name: pub_year
schema.description: Publication year of the cited work.

schema.name: cit_window
schema.description: Citation window in years. Calculated by subtracting the publication year of the cited work from the publication year of the citing work.

schema.name: is_self_cit
schema.description: Citation is an author self-citation (0 = no, 1 = yes). A citation is regarded as an author self-citation if the citing and the cited publication have at least one author name in common.

schema.name: source_id
schema.description: OpenAlex source identifier (prefix with 'https://openalex.com/S' to get the full identifier).

schema.name: abbreviation
schema.description: Abbreviated title of the source (obtained from the ISSN Centre).

schema.name: source_type_id
schema.description: CWTS source type identifier. See [source_type] table.

schema.name: country_iso_alpha2_code
schema.description: ISO-standard 3166-1 2-letter code of the country with which the source is associated. See [country] table.

schema.name: host_organization_publisher_id
schema.description: OpenAlex publisher identifier of the host organization of the source (if the source is a journal, conference, or eBook platform). See [publisher] table.

schema.name: host_organization_institution_id
schema.description: OpenAlex institution identifier of the host organization of the source (if the source is a repository). See [institution] table.

schema.name: issn_l
schema.description: Linking International Standard Serial Number (ISSN-L) of the source.

schema.name: openalex_id
schema.description: OpenAlex identifier (prefix with 'https://openalex.com/' to get the full identifier).

schema.name: wikidata_id
schema.description: Wikidata source identifier. For more information, see https://www.wikidata.org.

schema.name: fatcat_id
schema.description: Fatcat source identifier. For more information, see https://fatcat.wiki.

schema.name: is_in_doaj
schema.description: Source is listed in the Directory of Open Access Journals (DOAJ) (0 = no, 1 = yes).

schema.name: is_oa
schema.description: Source is currenlty fully-open-access (0 = no, 1 = yes). This could be true for a preprint repository where everything uploaded is free to read, or for a Gold or Diamond open access journal, where all newly published works are available for free under an open license.

schema.name: apc_price_usd
schema.description: APC price of the source in US Dollars (obtained from DOAJ).

schema.name: updated_date
schema.description: The date and time anything in the corresponding OpenAlex source record was last changed.

schema.name: created_date
schema.description: The date the source was introduced in the OpenAlex dataset.

schema.name: work_id
schema.description: OpenAlex work identifier (prefix with 'https://openalex.com/W' to get the full identifier).

schema.name: work_type_id
schema.description: CWTS work type identifier. See [work_type] table.

schema.name: crossref_work_type_id
schema.description: CWTS work type identifier. See [work_type] table.

schema.name: source_id
schema.description: OpenAlex source identifier. See [source] table. This is the identifier of the source where you can find the best (closest to the version of record) copy of the work (refered to as the primary location in the [work_location] table). For a peer-reviewed journal article, the best copy would be a full text published version, hosted by the publisher at the article's DOI URL.

schema.name: pub_date
schema.description: Date on which the work was published.

schema.name: pub_year
schema.description: Year in which the work was published.

schema.name: volume
schema.description: Volume number of the source in which the work was published.

schema.name: issue
schema.description: Issue number of the source in which the work was published.

schema.name: doi_registration_agency_id
schema.description: CWTS DOI registration agency identifier. See [doi_registration_agency] table.

schema.name: doi
schema.description: Digital Object Identifier of the work.

schema.name: openalex_id
schema.description: OpenAlex identifier (prefix with 'https://openalex.com/' to get the full identifier).

schema.name: pmcid
schema.description: PubMed Central identifier of the work.

schema.name: language_iso2_code
schema.description: ISO-standard 639-1 2-letter language code of the work language.

schema.name: is_paratext
schema.description: The work is paratext (0 = no, 1 = yes). In the context of OpenAlex, paratext is stuff that's published in scholarly sources (like a journals) but is about the source rather than a scholarly work properly speaking.  Some examples are: front cover, back cover, table of contents, editorial board listing, and issue information.

schema.name: is_retracted
schema.description: The work is known to be retracted (0 = no, 1 = yes).

schema.name: is_oa
schema.description: The work can be read for free, without registration (0 = no, 1 = yes).

schema.name: any_repository_has_fulltext
schema.description: The full text of any of the versions of the work is available in a repository.

schema.name: oa_status_id
schema.description: CWTS open access status identifier. See [oa_status] table.

schema.name: oa_url
schema.description: Open access URL for the work.

schema.name: apc_list_currency
schema.description: Currency of the listed APC price of the work (as listed by the journal's publisher).

schema.name: apc_list_price
schema.description: Listed APC price of the work (as listed by the journal's publisher).

schema.name: apc_list_price_usd
schema.description: Listed APC price of the work (as listed by the journal's publisher) in US Dollars.

schema.name: apc_list_apc_provenance_id
schema.description: CWTS APC provenance data source identifier of the listed APC price. See apc_provenance] table.

schema.name: apc_paid_currency
schema.description: Currency of the paid APC price of the work (as listed by the journal's publisher).

schema.name: apc_paid_price
schema.description: Paid APC price of the work.

schema.name: apc_paid_price_usd
schema.description: Paid APC price of the work in US Dollars.

schema.name: apc_paid_apc_provenance_id
schema.description: CWTS APC provenance data source identifier of the paid APC price. See apc_provenance] table.

schema.name: fulltext_origin_id
schema.description: CWTS full text origin identifer. See fulltext_origin] table.

schema.name: n_refs
schema.description: Number of cited references of the work.

schema.name: n_cits
schema.description: Number of citations of the work.

schema.name: updated_date
schema.description: The date and time anything in the corresponding OpenAlex work record was last changed.

schema.name: created_date
schema.description: The date the work was introduced in the OpenAlex dataset.

schema.description: List of names of the other authors of a work. If a work has more than seven authors, the name of the second, third, fourth, fifth and last author is listed.

schema.description: Name of the first affiliated organization of the work.

schema.name: institution_et_al
schema.description: List of names of the other affiliated organizations of a work. If a work has more than seven affiliated organizations, the name of the second, third, fourth, fifth and last affiliated organization is listed.

schema.description: Year in which the work was published.

schema.description: Volume number of the source in which the work was published.

schema.name: issue
schema.description: Issue number of the source in which the work was published.

schema.name: n_cits
schema.description: Number of citations of the work.

schema.name: n_self_cits
schema.description: Number of author self-citations of the work. A citation is regarded as an author self-citation if the citing and the cited work have at least one author name in common.

schema.name: source_id
schema.description: OpenAlex source identifier (prefix with 'https://openalex.com/S' to get the full identifier).

schema.name: abbreviation
schema.description: Abbreviated title of the source (obtained from the ISSN Centre).

schema.name: source_type_id
schema.description: CWTS source type identifier. See [source_type] table.

schema.name: country_iso_alpha2_code
schema.description: ISO-standard 3166-1 2-letter code of the country with which the source is associated. See [country] table.

schema.name: host_organization_publisher_id
schema.description: OpenAlex publisher identifier of the host organization of the source (if the source is a journal, conference, or eBook platform). See [publisher] table.

schema.name: host_organization_institution_id
schema.description: OpenAlex institution identifier of the host organization of the source (if the source is a repository). See [institution] table.

schema.name: issn_l
schema.description: Linking International Standard Serial Number (ISSN-L) of the source.

schema.name: openalex_id
schema.description: OpenAlex identifier (prefix with 'https://openalex.com/' to get the full identifier).

schema.name: wikidata_id
schema.description: Wikidata source identifier. For more information, see https://www.wikidata.org.

schema.name: fatcat_id
schema.description: Fatcat source identifier. For more information, see https://fatcat.wiki.

schema.name: is_in_doaj
schema.description: Source is listed in the Directory of Open Access Journals (DOAJ) (0 = no, 1 = yes).

schema.name: is_oa
schema.description: Source is currenlty fully-open-access (0 = no, 1 = yes). This could be true for a preprint repository where everything uploaded is free to read, or for a Gold or Diamond open access journal, where all newly published works are available for free under an open license.

schema.name: apc_price_usd
schema.description: APC price of the source in US Dollars (obtained from DOAJ).

schema.name: updated_date
schema.description: The date and time anything in the corresponding OpenAlex source record was last changed.

schema.name: created_date
schema.description: The date the source was introduced in the OpenAlex dataset.

schema.name: work_id
schema.description: OpenAlex work identifier (prefix with 'https://openalex.com/W' to get the full identifier).

schema.name: work_type_id
schema.description: CWTS work type identifier. See [work_type] table.

schema.name: crossref_work_type_id
schema.description: CWTS work type identifier. See [work_type] table.

schema.name: source_id
schema.description: OpenAlex source identifier. See [source] table. This is the identifier of the source where you can find the best (closest to the version of record) copy of the work (refered to as the primary location in the [work_location] table). For a peer-reviewed journal article, the best copy would be a full text published version, hosted by the publisher at the article's DOI URL.

schema.name: pub_date
schema.description: Date on which the work was published.

schema.name: pub_year
schema.description: Year in which the work was published.

schema.name: volume
schema.description: Volume number of the source in which the work was published.

schema.name: issue
schema.description: Issue number of the source in which the work was published.

schema.name: doi_registration_agency_id
schema.description: CWTS DOI registration agency identifier. See [doi_registration_agency] table.

schema.name: doi
schema.description: Digital Object Identifier of the work.

schema.name: openalex_id
schema.description: OpenAlex identifier (prefix with 'https://openalex.com/' to get the full identifier).

schema.name: pmcid
schema.description: PubMed Central identifier of the work.

schema.name: language_iso2_code
schema.description: ISO-standard 639-1 2-letter language code of the work language.

schema.name: is_paratext
schema.description: The work is paratext (0 = no, 1 = yes). In the context of OpenAlex, paratext is stuff that's published in scholarly sources (like a journals) but is about the source rather than a scholarly work properly speaking.  Some examples are: front cover, back cover, table of contents, editorial board listing, and issue information.

schema.name: is_retracted
schema.description: The work is known to be retracted (0 = no, 1 = yes).

schema.name: is_oa
schema.description: The work can be read for free, without registration (0 = no, 1 = yes).

schema.name: any_repository_has_fulltext
schema.description: The full text of any of the versions of the work is available in a repository.

schema.name: oa_status_id
schema.description: CWTS open access status identifier. See [oa_status] table.

schema.name: oa_url
schema.description: Open access URL for the work.

schema.name: apc_list_currency
schema.description: Currency of the listed APC price of the work (as listed by the journal's publisher).

schema.name: apc_list_price
schema.description: Listed APC price of the work (as listed by the journal's publisher).

schema.name: apc_list_price_usd
schema.description: Listed APC price of the work (as listed by the journal's publisher) in US Dollars.

schema.name: apc_list_apc_provenance_id
schema.description: CWTS APC provenance data source identifier of the listed APC price. See apc_provenance] table.

schema.name: apc_paid_currency
schema.description: Currency of the paid APC price of the work (as listed by the journal's publisher).

schema.name: apc_paid_price
schema.description: Paid APC price of the work.

schema.name: apc_paid_price_usd
schema.description: Paid APC price of the work in US Dollars.

schema.name: apc_paid_apc_provenance_id
schema.description: CWTS APC provenance data source identifier of the paid APC price. See apc_provenance] table.

schema.name: fulltext_origin_id
schema.description: CWTS full text origin identifer. See fulltext_origin] table.

schema.name: n_refs
schema.description: Number of cited references of the work.

schema.name: n_cits
schema.description: Number of citations of the work.

schema.name: updated_date
schema.description: The date and time anything in the corresponding OpenAlex work record was last changed.

schema.name: created_date
schema.description: The date the work was introduced in the OpenAlex dataset.

schema.name: concept_id
schema.description: OpenAlex concept identifier (prefix with 'https://openalex.com/C' to get the full identifier).

schema.name: level
schema.description: Concept hierarchy level. Concepts are organized hierarchically in a tree. There are 19 root-level concepts, and six levels of descendents branching out from them.

schema.name: wikipedia_url

schema.name: image_url
schema.description: URL of an image representing this concept.

schema.name: thumbnail_url
schema.description: URL of a smaller version of the image at [image_url].

schema.name: updated_date
schema.description: The date and time anything in the corresponding OpenAlex concept record was last changed.

schema.name: created_date
schema.description: The date the concept was introduced in the OpenAlex dataset.

schema.name: source_id
schema.description: OpenAlex source identifier (prefix with 'https://openalex.com/S' to get the full identifier).

schema.name: abbreviation
schema.description: Abbreviated title of the source (obtained from the ISSN Centre).

schema.name: source_type_id
schema.description: CWTS source type identifier. See [source_type] table.

schema.name: country_iso_alpha2_code
schema.description: ISO-standard 3166-1 2-letter code of the country with which the source is associated. See [country] table.

schema.name: host_organization_publisher_id
schema.description: OpenAlex publisher identifier of the host organization of the source (if the source is a journal, conference, or eBook platform). See [publisher] table.

schema.name: host_organization_institution_id
schema.description: OpenAlex institution identifier of the host organization of the source (if the source is a repository). See [institution] table.

schema.name: issn_l
schema.description: Linking International Standard Serial Number (ISSN-L) of the source.

schema.name: openalex_id
schema.description: OpenAlex identifier (prefix with 'https://openalex.com/' to get the full identifier).

schema.name: wikidata_id
schema.description: Wikidata source identifier. For more information, see https://www.wikidata.org.

schema.name: fatcat_id
schema.description: Fatcat source identifier. For more information, see https://fatcat.wiki.

schema.name: is_in_doaj
schema.description: Source is listed in the Directory of Open Access Journals (DOAJ) (0 = no, 1 = yes).

schema.name: is_oa
schema.description: Source is currenlty fully-open-access (0 = no, 1 = yes). This could be true for a preprint repository where everything uploaded is free to read, or for a Gold or Diamond open access journal, where all newly published works are available for free under an open license.

schema.name: apc_price_usd
schema.description: APC price of the source in US Dollars (obtained from DOAJ).

schema.name: updated_date
schema.description: The date and time anything in the corresponding OpenAlex source record was last changed.

schema.name: created_date
schema.description: The date the source was introduced in the OpenAlex dataset.

schema.name: work_id
schema.description: OpenAlex work identifier (prefix with 'https://openalex.com/W' to get the full identifier).

schema.name: work_type_id
schema.description: CWTS work type identifier. See [work_type] table.

schema.name: crossref_work_type_id
schema.description: CWTS work type identifier. See [work_type] table.

schema.name: source_id
schema.description: OpenAlex source identifier. See [source] table. This is the identifier of the source where you can find the best (closest to the version of record) copy of the work (refered to as the primary location in the [work_location] table). For a peer-reviewed journal article, the best copy would be a full text published version, hosted by the publisher at the article's DOI URL.

schema.name: pub_date
schema.description: Date on which the work was published.

schema.name: pub_year
schema.description: Year in which the work was published.

schema.name: volume
schema.description: Volume number of the source in which the work was published.

schema.name: issue
schema.description: Issue number of the source in which the work was published.

schema.name: doi_registration_agency_id
schema.description: CWTS DOI registration agency identifier. See [doi_registration_agency] table.

schema.name: doi
schema.description: Digital Object Identifier of the work.

schema.name: openalex_id
schema.description: OpenAlex identifier (prefix with 'https://openalex.com/' to get the full identifier).

schema.name: pmcid
schema.description: PubMed Central identifier of the work.

schema.name: language_iso2_code
schema.description: ISO-standard 639-1 2-letter language code of the work language.

schema.name: is_paratext
schema.description: The work is paratext (0 = no, 1 = yes). In the context of OpenAlex, paratext is stuff that's published in scholarly sources (like a journals) but is about the source rather than a scholarly work properly speaking.  Some examples are: front cover, back cover, table of contents, editorial board listing, and issue information.

schema.name: is_retracted
schema.description: The work is known to be retracted (0 = no, 1 = yes).

schema.name: is_oa
schema.description: The work can be read for free, without registration (0 = no, 1 = yes).

schema.name: any_repository_has_fulltext
schema.description: The full text of any of the versions of the work is available in a repository.

schema.name: oa_status_id
schema.description: CWTS open access status identifier. See [oa_status] table.

schema.name: oa_url
schema.description: Open access URL for the work.

schema.name: apc_list_currency
schema.description: Currency of the listed APC price of the work (as listed by the journal's publisher).

schema.name: apc_list_price
schema.description: Listed APC price of the work (as listed by the journal's publisher).

schema.name: apc_list_price_usd
schema.description: Listed APC price of the work (as listed by the journal's publisher) in US Dollars.

schema.name: apc_list_apc_provenance_id
schema.description: CWTS APC provenance data source identifier of the listed APC price. See apc_provenance] table.

schema.name: apc_paid_currency
schema.description: Currency of the paid APC price of the work (as listed by the journal's publisher).

schema.name: apc_paid_price
schema.description: Paid APC price of the work.

schema.name: apc_paid_price_usd
schema.description: Paid APC price of the work in US Dollars.

schema.name: apc_paid_apc_provenance_id
schema.description: CWTS APC provenance data source identifier of the paid APC price. See apc_provenance] table.

schema.name: fulltext_origin_id
schema.description: CWTS full text origin identifer. See fulltext_origin] table.

schema.name: n_refs
schema.description: Number of cited references of the work.

schema.name: n_cits
schema.description: Number of citations of the work.

schema.name: updated_date
schema.description: The date and time anything in the corresponding OpenAlex work record was last changed.

schema.name: created_date
schema.description: The date the work was introduced in the OpenAlex dataset.

schema.name: n_cits
schema.description: Number of citations of the work.

schema.name: n_self_cits
schema.description: Number of author self-citations of the work. A citation is regarded as an author self-citation if the citing and the cited work have at least one author name in common.
